Package com.phunware.engagement.messages

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageListener
    Used for receiving notifications from the MessageManager when messages are added, updated, or removed from the manager. These methods are called if the MessageListener has been added to the MessageManager via the MessageManager.addMessageListener method.
    MessageManager
    MessageManager provides a means to manage Messages. You can also supply a MessageListener to be notified of message related events. To receive message events when your Activity is in the foreground, or to perform actions like updating the application UI or displaying additional information, add a MessageListener via the MessageManager.addMessageListener method. Note that you must also remove the listener via MessageManager.removeMessageListener to avoid leaks.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SimpleMessageListener
    Simple implementation of MessageListener with stub implementations of each method. Extend this if you don't intend to override every method of MessageListener.
